Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke was here last
sp=script.Parent
local debris=game:GetService("Debris") local creator=sp:WaitForChild("creator")
damage=62 local splatted=false
local flakes = {"27131640", "27131658", "27131680", "27131699", "27131714"} local globs = {"27131730", "27131741","27131759"}
local HitSound=Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=27127113" HitSound.Parent=sp HitSound.Volume=1
function Snowface(p) local guiMain = Instance.new("GuiMain") guiMain.Parent = p.PlayerGui local mainFrame = Instance.new("Frame") mainFrame.Name = "PaintballEffect" mainFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) mainFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) mainFrame.BackgroundColor = BrickColor.new(1,1,1) mainFrame.Transparency = 1 mainFrame.BorderColor = BrickColor.new(1,1,1) debris:AddItem(guiMain, 10) mainFrame.Parent = guiMain
--- big glob local s = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local size = (math.random() * .2) + .5 s.Size = UDim2.new(size,0,size,0) s.Position = UDim2.new(math.random() - (size/2),0, math.random() - (size/2),0) s.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX s.Transparency = 1 s.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. globs[math.random(1, #globs)] debris:AddItem(s, 5 + (math.random() * 2)) s.Parent = mainFrame
--flakes for i=1,10 do local s = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local size = (math.random() * .05) + .05 s.Size = UDim2.new(size,0,size,0) s.Position = UDim2.new(math.random() - (size/2),0, math.random() - (size/2),0) s.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX s.Transparency = 1 s.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. flakes[math.random(1, #flakes)] debris:AddItem(s, 3 + (math.random() * 6)) s.Parent = mainFrame end
end
function onTouched(hit) if not splatted and hit.Parent and sp and sp:isDescendantOf(game.Workspace) and string.lower(string.sub(hit.Name,1,6))~="effect" and hit.Name~="Handle" then local targetplayer=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if creator and creator.Value and creator.Value.Character and not hit:isDescendantOf(creator.Value.Character) then splatted=true sp.Name="Effect" HitSound:Play() local humanoid=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and targetplayer then for _,v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local killertag=creator:clone() debris:AddItem(killertag,1) killertag.Parent=humanoid humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) Snowface(targetplayer) end --[[if part:IsA("Part") then --color hit part overallSize=part.Size.x+hit.Size.y+hit.Size.z if overallSize<40 then part.BrickColor=sp.BrickColor end end]] sp.CanCollide=false sp.Anchored=true sp.Transparency=1 local fire=Instance.new("Fire") fire.Heat=0 fire.Parent=sp fire.Color=sp.BrickColor.Color fire.SecondaryColor=sp.BrickColor.Color fire.Parent=sp wait(.3) if fire then fire.Enabled=false end wait(2) sp:remove() end end end
sp.Touched:connect(onTouched) debris:AddItem(sp,30)
wait(.1) if sp then sp.CanCollide=true --we do this so that the ball bounces off what it hits, then becomes invisible and the fire particles happen on the side of the surface that was it. end

t = script.Parent
function stick(x, y) weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = x weld.Part1 = y local HitPos = x.Position local CJ = CFrame.new(HitPos) local C0 = x.CFrame:inverse() *CJ local C1 = y.CFrame:inverse() * CJ weld.C0 = C0 weld.C1 = C1 weld.Parent = x end
function Weldnow() c = t:children() for n = 1, #c do if (c[n].className == "Part") then if (c[n].Name ~= "Handle") then c[n].CFrame = t.Handle.CFrame stick(c[n], t.Handle) end end end end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(Weldnow) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(Weldnow) Weldnow()

function Weld(x,y) local W = Instance.new("Weld") W.Part0 = x W.Part1 = y local CJ = CFrame.new(x.Position) local C0 = x.CFrame:inverse()*CJ local C1 = y.CFrame:inverse()*CJ W.C0 = C0 W.C1 = C1 W.Parent = x end
function Get(A) if A.className == "Part" then Weld(script.Parent.Handle, A) A.Anchored = false else local C = A:GetChildren() for i=1, #C do Get(C[i]) end end end
function Finale() Get(script.Parent) end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(Finale) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(Finale) Finale()

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
local weaponevent=sp:WaitForChild("WeaponEvent")
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) if mouse then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() weaponevent:FireServer("Fire",mouse.Hit.p) end) end end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

--Stickmasterluke
local sp=script.Parent
local weaponevent=sp:WaitForChild("WeaponEvent") local handle=sp:WaitForChild("Handle") local firesound=handle:WaitForChild("Fire") local debris=game:GetService("Debris") firerate=.4 velocity=200 loaded=false
local Pellet = Instance.new("Part") Pellet.Name="Paintball" Pellet.formFactor="Custom" Pellet.Size=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*.5 --Pellet.Shape="Ball" --can't be custom size Pellet.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Hot pink") Pellet.Material=Enum.Material.Plastic Pellet.Locked=true Pellet.CanCollide=false Pellet.TopSurface=0 Pellet.BottomSurface=0 local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshType="Sphere" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=Pellet sp:WaitForChild("ProjectileScript"):clone().Parent = Pellet
function gunUp() sp.GripPos=Vector3.new(0,0,0.8) end
function gunOut() sp.GripPos=Vector3.new(0,0,1) end
function onEquipped() firesound:Stop() end
function onUnequipped() firesound:Stop() end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
enabled=true function Fire(pos) if enabled and sp and sp.Parent then enabled=false local chr=sp.Parent local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local head=chr:FindFirstChild("Head") if h and h.Health>0 and head then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(chr) if plr then gunUp() firesound:Play()
local vec=(pos-head.Position).unit
local missile=Pellet:clone() missile.CFrame=CFrame.new(head.Position,head.Position+vec)--*CFrame.new(0,0,-5) missile.Velocity=vec*velocity missile.ProjectileScript.Disabled=false
local force=Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force=Vector3.new(0,missile:GetMass()*.8*196.2,0) force.Parent=missile
local creatortag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatortag.Name="creator" creatortag.Value=plr creatortag.Parent=missile
debris:AddItem(missile,10) missile.Parent=game.Workspace
wait(firerate*.5) gunOut() wait(firerate*.5) end end enabled=true end end
weaponevent.OnServerEvent:connect(function(plr,...) local tuple={...} if tuple[1]=="Fire" then Fire(tuple[2]) end end)
